author: yaraelpoof
title: Smart little set
review:
I personally thought this was a nicely designed set. The radar is cool and it's real small.
 I'd give it a five, but the wheels weren't given much thought and are a disaster. I love the astronaut/scientist 
 mini-fig because the torso looks awesome.

author: hustla187
title: Got It In Value Pack
review: I recently heard that ABC is doing a show called Life on Mars. The show has nothing to do with the theme made 6 years ago. So I decided to review one Life on Mars set for the occasion. Onto the review, I really like this set. The wheels are very unique and I like the driver. I dislike the so-called joustling stick. Besides that, it is a great set.

author: mrmitch
title: Chase the martians around in this little rover
review: I have two of these little sets, Inexpensive set, adds to my somewhat small Life on Mars collection. The wheels are strange but I guess the should be - who know the traction you would get on the surface of mars.  Like the mini fiqure - not a bad set - not a great set, good addition if you have a collection going with Life on Mars theme.

author: andy87
title: Cute little rover
review: This set has awkward wheels, and is pretty small, but still a good addition to a space collection. It, like most of the other sets, actaully looks ready to go explore mars! The minifigures are incredible in this theme, this one is no exception. And the satelaite is neat.
